title: CriptoBull
author: CriptoBull
created_time: May 21, 2023, 09:01:15 AMLast edit: July 10, 2023, 02:02:03 PM by CriptoBull
content: What do you think about PEPA?They claim to be the first ethical memecoin that aims to bring attention and attempt to solve global issues through, Sharing, Community strength, and Positive vibes.What ethical mean? they try to spread message like this (that it's agree with my idea):"Explain Why there is never enough money for Poor people, but there is ALWAYS money for Weapons"with reference to the current vicissitudes of war.There are some hilarious NFT on opensea which depict the powerful lords of the earth in a green key, my preferred is Trump one or Gheddafi one . There's a forum too, but is not too much used.sure it's a practically useless token, but at least it has a little underlying meaning.If you want to loose 10 minutes of your time take a look at WEBSITE:www.pepa.funPANCAKE LINK:https://pancakeswap.finance/swap?outputCurrency=0xE9565D3Ddb04089c08A73173449446e2dd31937bNFT OPENSEA LINKOPENSEA:https://opensea.io/collection/pepaworldhttps://opensea.io/collection/epicalmemeAUDIT:https://www.cyberscope.io/cyberscan?address=0xE9565D3Ddb04089c08A73173449446e2dd31937bFORUMhttps://pepatoken.freeforums.net/

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Spreading morals and values in society through memes seems like an innovative idea. At least these memes have a goal, even if it is very difficult, but the idea is noble and worth trying.I am not familiar with the project yet, but in principle I liked the idea, especially in these days when conflicts and wars spread around the world.

comments.author: PEPA TOKEN
comments.body: and i want to say thanks for your post, you understand totally the project!!!i dont ask you to buy PEPA token, dont care; but at least follow PEPA on twitter (https://twitter.com/Pepatoken) and, if you want, take some airdropped token <3

comments.author: zasad@
comments.body: "1) Follow our official Twitter account @PEPAToken.2) Like and retweet our airdrop announcement tweet.3) Reply our Airdrop announcement Tweet... remember to be bullish 3) Leave a Bullish reply on BitcoinTalk Announcement.4) Hold more than 10.000 PEPA's token in your BSC wallet to became a PEPE's WHALE.5) Submit your details in the airdrop form provided.6) And Very important: give a slap to Pepa's CEO."https://www.pepa.fun/#AIRDROPIt is not worth wasting time to study such coins, the earning scheme is very simple, to sell as many tokens as possible to the community, and then the price of the token will fall. If they manage to redeem a lot of tokens again, then we will see a new pump.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: QuoteDesigned to bring attention to global issuesAka pump and dump money grab that's going to rug all the participants. Where exactly are the ethics on this? Are they donating to somewhere or something? Talking about memes and patting yourself in the back because you think peace is better then war has nothing to do with ethics. Sounds like there's no plan except holding your hands virtually. They could actually turn this to something good, but from reading the web page it looks like even they don't know what that would be like. Changing one letter from pepe doesn't make this original meme either. They are basically taking away only thing what makes meme coin honest by trying to say it will have more gravitas. Thing that annoy me more than meme coins is meme coins pretending to be more than just memecoins. Stay away, it's a money grab.

comments.author: bluebit25
comments.body: It's funny to see an environment of garbage from meme coins, a lot of things that I think they can use as an idea to exaggerate about it. People who have no knowledge of the field or even those who understand it try to deceive each other with promises of future profits. This is a waste of time and looks like a game that I think is wrong to approach in life, if you are not alert enough, you will also make other mistakes, honestly, stay away from things this trash in the crypto environment, because it simply makes you more and more failed.

comments.body: Quote from: yhiaali3 on May 24, 2023, 11:55:11 AMSpreading morals and values in society through memes seems like an innovative idea. At least these memes have a goal, even if it is very difficult, but the idea is noble and worth trying.I am not familiar with the project yet, but in principle I liked the idea, especially in these days when conflicts and wars spread around the world.Someone like me can't accept the fact that i will have to believe in every memecoins i see, they are just a temporary projects as many do believe this about them, which calls for more care to be taken before you can have interest in one, they may all not be as bad as being expected but the risk on them is somewhat high beyond the reasonable extent one can cope with, this sounds like the Pepe memecoin but i believe they are upto task for something good for delivery before launching out.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: I think you should stay away from this BS. The project almost completely copies the famous PEPE memcoin and claims itself after the hype around PEPE is over. What can you hope for when you buy this shitcoin? That it will make you richer? No, it will only make the creator of this clone richer, and all this legend about morality is just beautiful words to somehow attract investors, if nothing else can attract.

comments.body: Looking for ideas to create memes related to your countryBTW, if you have any ideas related to your country to make memes in the style of pepper, you are welcome, we will try to make them and publish them.We're looking for ideas that reflect some of the people's discontent to try and raise awareness of these issues across the community.We can also contribute and give away tokens; what do you think?if you want to follow us on twitter, here is the linkhttps://twitter.com/Pepatoken
